extension.name: Flexible - VirtueMart Shopping Cart
extension.author: flexiblewebdesign.com
extension.description: Virtuemart 2 Dropdown Shopping Cart. Developed by LineLab, modified and enriched by Flexible Web Design

field.name: theme
field.label: Theme
field.description: Choose a theme that fits your website layout the best.

field.name: orientation
field.label: Dropdown Box Orientation
field.description: Choose the orientation based on which (left-right) side you are using the shopping cart in your website. If you choose LEFT, then the dropdowned box will be floated to left side, RIGHT is the other way around. For better understand, try the parameters and see the result in action in the front-end.

field.name: dropdownwidth
field.label: Dropdown Box Width
field.description: Do not put 'px' (pixel) at the end. Just enter the value.

field.name: dropdowcount
field.label: Product in a row
field.description: In the dropdown box, items are listed side-by side. Define how many product you would like to list in a row. The product thumbnail will be resized automatically based on dropdown width and the product in a row number
